meanings.definition: Take part in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: I like to participate in school plays.
meanings.sent2: She will participate in the charity run next week.
meanings.sent3: The whole family decided to participate in a dance-off for fun.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm to participate in the game was like a spark igniting a fire.
meanings.sent5: The children eagerly participate in the treasure hunt, searching high and low.

meanings.sent1: We all need to participate in keeping our community clean.
meanings.sent2: He is happy to participate in the team project.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to participate in the conversation by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: Her mind seemed to participate in a dance of ideas, swirling and twirling.
meanings.sent5: The students actively participate in the science experiment, mixing and observing.
